entries.title: Monthly Statistics - Maldives Monetary Authority
entries.text: Monthly Statistics provides selected economic and financial data as provided by the respective government authorities, commercial banks, and financial ...

entries.title: Payments Bulletin - Maldives Monetary Authority
entries.text: Payments Bulletin is an annual publication of the MMA. The bulletin provides an overview of the Maldivian Payments Landscape.

entries.title: Quarterly Economic Bulletin - Maldives Monetary Authority
entries.text: Quarterly Economic Bulletin provides detailed information about recent developments in the domestic and international economy.

entries.title: Research and Policy Notes - Maldives Monetary Authority
entries.text: Research and Policy Notes cover in-depth research and analysis carried out by the staff of the Maldives Monetary Authority for both internal and external ...

entries.text: Speech by Dr. Azeema Adam, Governor of the Maldives Monetary Authority at the Opening Ceremony of the Commercial Bank of Maldives, Hotel Jen, Male
